changeSet.author: bsutton
changeSet.sql: insert into tenant (organisation_id, CONSISTENCYVERSION) select id, 1 from organisation where organisation.isourscoutgroup = 1

update organisation
set tenant_id = (select id from tenant)

changeSet.author: bsutton
changeSet.sql: update address join organisation on organisation.isourscoutgroup = 1 set address.tenant_id = organisation.tenant_id
